endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: alpha

param_schema.title: Alpha
param_schema.description: Interpolation alpha if using two prompts. A value of 0 uses prompt_a fully, a value of 1 uses prompt_b fully

parameters.description: Interpolation alpha if using two prompts. A value of 0 uses prompt_a fully, a value of 1 uses prompt_b fully

parameters.name: prompt_b

param_schema.title: Prompt B
param_schema.description: The second prompt to interpolate with the first, leave blank if no interpolation

parameters.description: The second prompt to interpolate with the first, leave blank if no interpolation

parameters.name: denoising

param_schema.title: Denoising
param_schema.description: How much to transform input spectrogram

parameters.description: How much to transform input spectrogram

parameters.name: num_inference_steps

param_schema.title: Num Inference Steps
param_schema.description: Number of steps to run the diffusion model

parameters.description: Number of steps to run the diffusion model
